Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Manchester in 1973...
Injured on 7/4/1973 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1975, off Patrick Heier (SHP)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1975, off Larry Warren (NE)...
Injured on 5/9/1975 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Wisconsin on 7/19/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/2/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 6/23/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $720,000 per year...
